statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: RJ White scored 19 points, Kayel Locke had 18 points and seven rebounds, and UNC-Greensboro beat Division II Chowan 81-60 on Tuesday night.
article.headline: UNC-Greensboro pulls away from D-II Chowas 81-60
article.linkText: UNC-Greensboro pulls away from D-II Chowas 81-60
article.story: GREENSBORO, N.C. -- RJ White scored 19 points, Kayel Locke had 18 points and seven rebounds, and UNC-Greensboro beat Division II Chowan 81-60 on Tuesday night. UNC-Greensboro led by 17 points early in the second half, but Chowan clawed within single digits at 54-45 with 10:44 remaining. The Spartans steadily increased their lead and Marvin Smith's 3-pointer made it 76-56 with 2:43 left. Francis Alonso added 12 points for UNC-Greensboro (2-0). The Spartans made 30 of 55 field goals (55 percent), including eight 3-pointers, and hit 13 of 23 free throws. Diante Baldwin had 7 points and six rebounds in the first half to help UNC-Greensboro build a 35-25 lead at halftime. Hank Edmonds led Chowan with 16 points and Marco Haskins added 15. It was an exhibition game for the Braves.
